extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods to deal with date time

    • Method Detail

      • getTimestampSafe

        public static long getTimestampSafe()
        Returns a unique timestamp considering the last stored timestamp. If the current timestamp is equal to the last one, one millisecond is added. The last step is repeated until a distinct timestamp is found.
        Returns:
        a unique timestamp

      • getDateSafe

        public static java.util.Date getDateSafe()
        Returns a unique Date considering the last stored timestamp. If the current timestamp is equal to the last one, one millisecond is added. The last step is repeated until a distinct timestamp is found.
        Returns:
        a unique Date

      • getDate

        public static java.lang.String getDate(java.lang.String pattern)
        Return the current timestamp formatted using the given pattern.
        Parameters:
        pattern - a valid date pattern, e.g. yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss
        Returns:
